I've never had any major issues with the visual quality of YIFY's torrents. The sound, on the other hand, has caused me to now very rarely download his torrents.
I also agree with mgman771 , all YIFY uploads are NOT HD quality and should be posted in the correct section.

I'd be OK with YIFY getting his own section. The movies are good enough for 90% of my movie consumption. Most of the stuff I get from YIFY isn't stuff I would pay to watch anyway. And if I would pay to watch it, I usually do exactly that and buy a proper HD version of it. Come to think of it, why are people whining about this at all?
